name: Steamed Date Pudding with Butterscotch Sauce
instructions: Add orange zest, brown sugar, and treacle to the flour and dates.
Lightly whisk an egg and mix into the milk.
Add the egg and milk mixture to the dry ingredients and mix.
Pour the batter into the mold.
Cover the mold tightly with parchment paper and foil.
Place the mold in a pan of water and steam for approximately two hours with the lid on.
To make the butterscotch sauce: Add butter, brown sugar, golden syrup, a pinch of salt, and vanilla seeds to a pan.
Melt and combine over a medium heat, stirring.
Stir in cream and simmer until thickened.
